nodes.text: Umate was one of the highest peaks of the Manarai Mountains on Coruscant.

It was the only outcropping of natural stone on the planet's surface. It was protected by the monks of the Flames of Umate cult, who patrolled the peak and prevented tourists from chipping off souvenirs from the stone. It was surrounded by Monument Plaza.
The monks meditated while touching the rock in an effort to contact Coruscant's 'inner spirit'.
